mapper.select: select (select curr_date from ttrd_currdate) as 创建日期, i.i_name as 机构名称, tr_type.description as 业务种类, tr.ord_id as 审批单号, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, tr.i_name as 产品名称, tr.a_type as 债券性质, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 回购金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_ytm * 100 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 回购利率, tr.orddate as 交易日期, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 结算金额, tr.operator as 执行人, tr.trader as 交易确认人, 'T+' || to_char(tr.setdays) 清算速度, tr.intordid as 成交单编号, tr.setdate as 首期结算日期, to_char(to_date(tr.setdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')+to_number(substr(tr.i_name,1,instr(tr.i_name,'日')-1)),'yyyy-mm-dd') as 到期结算日期, substr(tr.i_name,1,instr(tr.i_name,'日')-1) 回购期限 FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join ttrd_outright tot on tr.i_code = tot.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type where tr.ord_id = (select distinct trr.ord_id FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE trr where trr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId}) and tr.ref_sysordid is null and tr.ordstatus<0
